page.title: 02The Duke of Buccleuch
page.content: Walter Francis John Montagu Douglas Scott is the 9th. Duke of Buccleuch and 11th. of Queensberry. Buccleuch is pronounced Â£Buck-loo'. There have been Dukes of Buccleuch since 1663 when the title was created. The present Duke was born on 28th. September 1923 and took on the title in 1973. Unfortunately an accident has confined him to a wheelchair but this has not prevented him from leading a very full and active life. He takes a keen interest in the Boughton Estate and his Scottish properties. His Grace's wish that people should share the delights that Boughton House and Estate can offer has been much appreciated by all who visit and especially the many school parties during Estate open days. 2500 children visited on two days in 1985.
